casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

August 17, 2007

[Cite as 08/17/2007 Case Announcements, 2007-Ohio-4185.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-0579. Lovell v. Levin.

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 2006-M-782. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Board of Tax Appeals. Upon consideration of appellants’ motion to strike portions of appellee’s merit brief,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
